forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early with some clearing for the afternoon. High 9C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then partly cloudy for the afternoon. High 48F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low 1C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low 34F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 46F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 49F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
